title: (x) "Andy Cooke" similar to Heroic Condensed - Univers Ultra Condensed {Chris Keegan}
content:
Came across this guys portfolio... curious about the typeface he's used in the image attached.

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 21.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404002236/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%2021_3.png) | 5.92 KB |
author: McKonkie

comments.content: I think it's Univers Ultra Condensed Thin.

what's wrong with using Heroic Condensed?

;-)

_what’s wrong with using Heroic Condensed?_

Indeed! Who better than the font designer to ask that question?

- Mike Yanega

haha, absolutely nothing! Its a great typeface. I just wanted to know what this one was... Heroic Condensed has had such a profound impact on my life that it was the first typeface this one reminded me of...

:)
